content.1/f Abigail 500/p Abigail/d Sat: none/-9999 -4/farmer 13 6 3 Abigail 3 6 2/skippable/showFrame Abigail 20/specificTemporarySprite abbyvideoscreen/viewport 9 4 true/pause 1000/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/emote Abigail 52/pause 800/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/temporarySprite 2 4 27 8 50/shake Abigail 500/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/temporarySprite 4 4 27 8 50 true/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 450/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 550/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound cowboy_dead/pause 850/emote Abigail 28/playMusic distantBanjo/showFrame Abigail 21/pause 80/showFrame Abigail 22/pause 80/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 200/emote Abigail 16/pause 600/speak Abigail "@?"/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Abigail "你怎麼偷偷溜進我的房間，嚇死我了！"/faceDirection Abigail 0/speak Abigail "*唉*……我玩“草原之王的冒險之旅”已經好幾個小時了，卻連第一關都過不去……$s#$b#這遊戲難度也太誇張了吧！$a#$b#呃，要不然就是我技術太差了。$s"/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 1000/emote Abigail 16/pause 300/speak Abigail "嘿，你要不要和我一起玩玩這一關？有你幫忙應該會簡單些。"/faceDirection farmer 3/farmerAnimation 97/pause 1000/faceDirection Abigail 0/move farmer 0 1 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/globalFade/cutscene AbigailGame/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/faceDirection farmer 1/fork beatGame/pause 600/emote Abigail 28/pause 400/speak Abigail "呃，我放棄了……看來這輩子是過不了第二關了。$s#$b#好吧……至少努力過了。"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 96/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/end
content.beatGame: playMusic jaunty/speak Abigail "嘿，挺有意思的！$h#$b#好的，謝謝。@你用手把還真是有一套啊。這倒也說得通。$h^非常感謝。 @。本沒想到你玩操作杆這麼嫻熟！感覺像是很有經驗的樣子呢！$h"/pause 500/emote Abigail 32/pause 1000/end
content.3/f Abigail 2000/p Abigail/t 2000 2200/n: echos/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 6 3 Abigail 6 8 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite abbyOuijaCandles/viewport 7 5/speak Abigail "嘿！我正想著你什麼時候來呢。我想給你看一樣東西。"/move farmer -5 0 0/move farmer 0 2 3/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "你看到了嗎？這個就是通靈板。你以前用過嗎？"/emote farmer 8/move Abigail 0 2 1/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "把咱倆的手一起放到板子上……$l"/showFrame Abigail 30/pause 200/animate farmer true true 9999 89/pause 600/speak Abigail "現在，靈魂將把我們領向……$h"/showFrame Abigail 31/pause 500/speak Abigail "快看！在動欸！$7"/emote farmer 16/speak Abigail "第一個字母是……'我' ……"/pause 600/speak Abigail "下一個是……'<' ……"/pause 800/speak Abigail "哇，快看它動的多帶勁！它寫著……'%firstnameletter'……#$b#我 < %firstnameletter……？"/emote Abigail 16/showFrame Abigail 12/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/pause 200/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 400/specificTemporarySprite abbyOuija/playSound swordswipe/pause 900/playSound seeds/pause 500/speak Abigail "哎呀，一不留神把板子打翻了！嘻嘻……$h#$b#這就是個蠢遊戲，沒什麼意義的啦。$9"/faceDirection Abigail 3/emote Abigail 60/faceDirection Abigail 1/speak Abigail "我，呃，還有事要做。你得走了……對不起了。$9"/faceDirection Abigail 2/emote farmer 28/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/move farmer 5 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisibleWarpOut Abigail
content.16/f Pierre 1500/p Pierre: Hospital_Ambient/20 5/farmer 20 12 0 Pierre 14 15 0/skippable/doAction 20 11/move farmer 0 -7 1/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/showFrame 35/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/playSound secret1/stopAnimation farmer/message "你找到了皮埃爾的'秘密收藏'。"/pause 1000/speak Pierre "嘿！誰在臥室裡？$4"/warp Pierre 20 12 true/faceDirection Pierre 0/playMusic ragtime/move Pierre 0 -4 0 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame 94/jump farmer/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/proceedPosition Pierre/emote Pierre 16/speed Pierre 4/move Pierre 0 -3 1 false/move Pierre -1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Pierre "你……你是怎麼發現的？！$4"/faceDirection Pierre 2/pause 200/faceDirection Pierre 0/speak Pierre "快給我！$u"/showFrame 95/pause 300/playSound coin/pause 600/showFrame 0/pause 500/speak Pierre "$q 50 null#發誓你不會把這事告訴任何人。#$r 50 70 Event_naga1#我會為你保守秘密的。#$r 50 -500 Event_naga2#這事應該讓你太太知道。"/pause 500/speed Pierre 2/move Pierre 1 0 2/emote Pierre 12/speak Pierre "*嘟囔*……這下又得找個新的藏匿點了……*嘟囔*$u"/move Pierre 0 8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.17/f Caroline 1500/p Caroline/p Abigail: 50s/35 9/farmer 31 13 0 Abigail 34 9 1 Caroline 35 9 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Abigail "不要再對我的生活指手畫腳了！$a"/pause 500/speak Caroline "喂，別鬧了！我們讓你在讀完書之前住在這裡，一個錢都不花。但看樣子你一點感激的意思都沒有啊！$u"/emote Abigail 12/speak Abigail "不要再讓我內疚了。$a#$b#有你和老爸幫忙，我真的很感激，但讓我按照你們的方式生活，實在是太不可理喻了。$a#$b#我已經不是小姑娘了，媽。$u"/faceDirection Caroline 1/pause 1500/faceDirection Caroline 3/speak Caroline "……你說得對。我很抱歉。$s"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound woodyStep/faceDirection Abigail 2 true/faceDirection Caroline 2/speak Abigail "有人在嗎？$7"/faceDirection farmer 0/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 1 3/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 2 true/move Abigail -3 0 2 false/emote Abigail 8/speak Abigail "我和你說，這屋子絕對在鬧鬼。"/emote Caroline 40/pause 500/end dialogue Abigail "呃啊啊……$a#$b#抱歉……我剛才在和我媽吵架。$s"

true/faceDirection Robin 0 true/faceDirection Emily 0 true/showFrame Harvey 26 true/faceDirection Caroline 2 true/screenFlash 1/pause 2000/speak Caroline "好吧。好，今天的體操課就到此為止！#$b#你出汗了沒？$h"/pause 500/speak Harvey "*喘息*……*喘息*……出了。$7"/move Pam -1 0 3 true/faceDirection Jodi 2/faceDirection Emily 1 true/viewport move 0 -1 3000/move farmer 3 0 1/faceDirection Robin 3/faceDirection Marnie 1 true/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -8 3/emote Harvey 16/speak Harvey "@！你一直在看嗎？$8#$b#……真是丟人……本來還想瞞著大家呢。至少也不該讓你知道。$s"/move Harvey -2 0 3/speak Harvey "我只是想保持健康的體魄。畢竟年紀大了，就更需要努力了。#$b#但我身體還是不行……總覺得跟不上他們呢。$s"/pause 400/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection Harvey 3/speak Harvey "$q -1 null#聽著……別告訴鎮上的人我在跳健身操，好嗎？#$r -1 20 event_aerobics1#我不會說的。#$r -1 -50 event_aerobics2#這我可說不好。"/pause 500/end dialogue Harvey "哎呦，真是累死人了……"
content.3102768/j 15/H: playful/6 21/farmer 6 29 0 Pierre 4 17 2 Gus 9 26 1 Marnie 3 23 0 Jodi 11 20 0 Demetrius 9 17 3 Morris -100 -100 0/broadcastEvent/skippable/move farmer 0 -5 0/move Gus 0 1 1 true/move Jodi -1 0 0 true/move farmer 0 -5 0 false/pause 500/move Pierre 1 0 2/speak Pierre "歡迎來到皮埃爾商店！有什麼需要的嗎？"/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp Morris 6 29/pause 1000/emote Pierre 8/playSound dwop/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 2/move Morris 0 -2 0/move Morris 0 -5 0/speak Morris "那個……"/pause 1000/faceDirection Marnie 1/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/move Morris 1 0 1/speak Morris "大家快來哦……Joja超市五折優惠券大放送啦！"/jump Pierre/textAboveHead Pierre "五折？！？！"/showFrame Pierre 16/shake Pierre 3000/faceDirection Demetrius 2/faceDirection Jodi 3/pause 1000/animate Morris false true 80 16 17 16 18/pause 1000/showFrame Pierre 0/speak Morris "嗯？有沒有人要啊？"/pause 500/advancedMove Marnie false 4 0/advancedMove Gus false -2 0 0 -3 -1 0 0 -2/advancedMove Jodi false -3 0 0 1/advancedMove Demetrius false 0 5 -1 0/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 1000/playMusic none/pause 500/warp Marnie -100 -100/warp Demetrius -100 -100/warp Jodi -100 -100/warp Gus -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/pause 500/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/speak Pierre "但……這價格我可比不了啊！這簡直是賠本賤賣！$s"/stopAnimation Morris/viewport 6 18 true/move Morris 0 -3 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Morris "失去了這麼忠實的顧客……一定很難受吧。#$b#但怎麼能怪他們呢？^顯然，Joja企業才是正確的選擇。$h#$b#很快，全鎮的人都會意識到這一點。"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Pierre 28/playSound dwop/faceDirection Morris 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Morris 2/move Morris 0 10 2 true/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Pierre "唉……$s"
content.963113/n pierreQualityCrops: distantBanjo/5 19/farmer 5 23 0 Pierre 5 17 2 Gus 5 19 0 Jodi 5 21 0 Marnie 10 20 0 Robin 2 24 3 Evelyn 9 26 1/hostMail MSB_Pierre/skippable/pause 3000/speak Pierre "格斯，我這裡正有你想要的東西……"/speak Gus "願聞其詳。"/speak Pierre "是一袋原種的有機蔬菜，本地生產的……#$b#經過精挑細選，質量和味道上乘。#$b#過了這個村，就沒這店了！"/speak Gus "聽起來不錯嘛！我在餐吧裡用得到優質蔬菜。多少錢？"/jump Pierre/pause 800/speak Pierre "只！要！……（咕噥咕噥）"/emote Gus 8/speak Gus "什麼東西？#$b#哈哈哈……我還以為我聽到了“25,000 金”。$h"/emote Pierre 40/speak Pierre "呃……就是這個價。確實很便宜吧？"/jump Gus/shake Gus 1000/pause 1000/speak Gus "皮埃爾，你瘋了嗎？我根本買不起，除非我把餐吧賣了！$3"/advancedMove Gus false 3 0 4 9999/move Jodi 0 -2 0 true/move farmer 0 -2 0 false/speak Jodi "我無意中聽到了價格……太離譜了！你應該感到慚愧。$3"/move Jodi 1 0 1/speak Pierre "等等！10,000 金如何？！$4"/textAboveHead Jodi "不可能！"/move Jodi 1 0 1/faceDirection Gus 3/pause 1000/emote Pierre 28/pause 100/proceedPosition Jodi/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Pierre "太糟糕了，@……$s#$b#我以為這個做生意的策略特別可靠。$s#$b#結果發現，即使我貼了個“有機”的標籤，還是沒有人願意以 10 倍的差價買蔬菜。$s"/pause 400/quickQuestion #有得必有失#別那麼貪婪#他們不買我的蔬菜，太氣人了(break)pause 300\speak Pierre "你說得對，做生意總會有風險。"(break)emote Pierre 12\speak Pierre "喂，我也沒有逼別人買啊！如果覺得價格不合適，大可直接離開。$3"\pause 1000\speak Pierre "……不過你說得也有道理。如果我惹惱了所有顧客，那很快就沒有人來買東西了……$s"(break)faceDirection Jodi 3\speak Jodi "@，你的蔬菜賣相很好。是皮埃爾出的價格把我們趕跑了。"\faceDirection Jodi 1\pause 1000/emote Pierre 40/speak Pierre "@，說起來……說不定你今天可以用這個蔬菜做一頓晚餐。#$b#你覺得呢，想要以 2,501 金的抄底價買回去嗎？"/emote farmer 12/end
